title.rendered: Olaplex No.6 Bond Smoother is Here!

content.rendered:
Introducing Olaplex No.6 Bond Smoother.  With a cult-like following filled with colourists, celebrities and everyday fans, the masterminds at Olaplex can officially do no wrong. Over the last few years, Olaplex has become a household name for anyone that colours, heat styles or basically wants amazing hair. Their in-salon system has allowed us to make bigger changes to our hair with minimal damage and their take-home regime comprised by No.3 Hair Perfector, No.4 Shampoo and No.5 Conditioner has revolutionised how we care for our hair at home.

And just when you think Olaplex couldn’t get any better, we’re here to tell you it is! We are excited to announce that Olaplex Bond Smoother has arrived! Want to get your hands on Olaplex Bond Smoother? Call one of our Olaplex Specialists or Contact Us to arrange the correct product and delivery! We will also throw some deluxe samples with all orders!

Olaplex No.6 Bond Smoother

Formulated with Olaplex Bond Building Chemistry. Olaplex No.6 Bond Smoother is a leave-in repairing styling cream that eliminates frizz, hydrates and protects all hair types –  including colour and chemically treated hair.

Key Ingredients & Benefits of Olaplex No.6 Bond Smoother

  • Patented Bis – Aminopropyl Diglycol Dimaleate – helps protect and restore damaged hair by repairing disulphide bonds broken during chemical processing. Bleach, peroxide, perms and chemical straighteners damage hair at a molecular level, leaving hair more fragile and susceptible to breaking. Bis – Aminopropyl Diglycol Dimaleate is a truly innovative ingredient with protective, nourishing and restructuring action for rejuvenating hair. Only available in Olaplex products.
  • Strengthens and rebuilds hair like other Olaplex products
  • Eliminates frizz and flyaways for up to 72 hours, making hair more manageable
  • Speeds up blow-drying time
  • Protects hair from heat styling
  • Hair is left feeling hydrated and soft without being weighed down
